title: Fated
description: The first shifter in the Pyte/Sentinel Series:  As the top Alpha male of Boston, it's Drew's job to keep his Pack safe, keep the humans from finding about their existence, try to pretend that he was fine with the way that his life was going and most importantly, not to give into the urge to kill Kara, the thorn in his side for way too long.  When fate steps in one night and destroys his world, he strikes back, but his new mate is more than he can handle...
author: R.L. Mathewson
